page.title: 04EVENTS, LOCAL NEWS
page.content: APPLEDORE'S {PARISH COUNCIL}CONSISTS OF SEVEN ELECTED MEMBERS AND A CLERK. MONTHLY MEETINGS ARE HELD TO DISCUSS MATTERS AFFECTING THE PARISH.THE RECENTLY RENOVATED AND EXTENDED VILLAGE HALL WAS FULLY REPORTED IN THE LOCAL PAPERS AT ITS 'GRAND OPENING'.THIS WAS FINANCED BY VILLAGE FUND RAISING AND FUNDS PROVIDED BY THE PARISH COUNCIL. APPLEDORE'S ONLY ANNUAL EVENT IS THE { {SCHOOL'S CHRISTMAS FAIR},THE PROCEEDS BEING FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE SCHOOL. THE APPLEDORE WOMEN'S INSTITUTE PROVIDE AN ANNUAL CHRISTMAS DINNER AND PARTY FOR THE VILLAGE OVER 65'S. THE VILLAGE HALL COMMITTEE ALSO GIVES A CHRISTMAS PARTY FOR ALL PRIMARY SCHOOL AGE CHILDREN.OCCASIONAL EVENTS INCLUDE BOOT FAIRS ON THE RECREATION GROUND AND DANCES AND DISCOS IN THE HALL.
